author: Melody Simmons
comment: I liked the design. I liked the cool features it boasted about in the description. I liked how well-rated it was and how positive the reviews were. I most definitely did NOT like trying to scan the SAME EXACT CODE forever. Either it would prompt me to put the code in view of the camera (while it's taking up most of the screen), or tell me to let the phone focus (while in focus) to then turn completely blurry, focus in and out, then finally be crystal-clear, and ask for the code to be put in view again. Ugh.
title: Good in Theory

author: Shakhar Dasgupta
comment: This is probably the fastest QR Code Reader. It is also ad-free. You can even make QR code. It's really feature rich. However, there are two things I didn't like about it. I couldn't figure out how to get the exact plain text encoded in the QR for types other than plain text (ex: vCard). It would also be great if it could directly connect to Wi-Fi without a separate plugin.

author: David H.
comment: I put this head-to-head with i-nigma, and QR Droid with the zxing engine consistently performed best. Both are fine with qrcodes, but i-nigma just couldn't compete on straight barcodes. I only found one blue-tinted bar that both i-nigma and zxing couldn't read, but switching to the zapper engine worked. I also like that QR Droid tells you what kind of code you just scanned. The only dislike I have is that the interface is rather unprofessional, esp. the comic font. Otherwise this is definitely the best.
title: We have a winner!

author: Dragos Mihai
comment: I think im doing something wrong. If i want to make a bitcoin link it has to start with bitcoin:(addr) but when i try it changes the source in bitcoin:/(addr). But the rest is just a plain simple app whitch i adore, the nerd style,plain functional, plus i love how good the code behind is.

author: Lee I.
comment: Used to have this installed, then forgot to install on a new phone... WHY did I not remember this APP? I've been using inferior APPS for too long. This has only improved over the years! So easy, so intuitive, so aqesome!

author: Yolanda Cherubin
comment: Spent over an hour trying to scan 3 Barcode. Still can't scan the last one.  Seems like camera can't stay in focus for more then a few seconds on this.  Don't know why but it's very frustrating.  Have even printed the Barcode and it still is not scanning.

author: Jim Wilson
comment: If it works great on my old Samsung Note 3, it SHOULD work on just about anything. I especially love the Settings customization though it may be a bit much for much for those who have trouble operating a parking meter. FYI, this app is free but it's worth at least $1.99 or more.
title: FAST AND EFFICIENT!

author: Shyam Kumar
comment: Just simple to say.. working on other QR code apps are waste that this.  I tried so many QR CODE APPS., all are waste.  This is best easy and quicker

author: J. Estes
comment: It is the only Android app I have found that will consistently read a micro QR code!  The only other app that claims to read these crashes.
title: Wow

author: Derek Johnson
comment: Best one I've tried. Don't look any further than this one. Easiest one to use with best layout. Beats Others with intrusive annoying adds hands down.

author: Eric Hill
comment: Another case of greedy developers running out of ideas. I've been using this for years, but once I wanted to use QR codes for my WiFi connections I had to decide that I'm not going to install plugins to use Android's built-in functionality.

author: Iron Spring
comment: Great code scanner but if you have issues with permissions there is another version of this one that is not as permission aggressive. It is by the same authors and has almost the same functions.  It works just as great as this one and the version numbers are generally matching. Can't say anything bad about this app anyway. NO STINKING ADS FLASHING IN YOUR FACE AND TOTALLY FREE.  Thanks authors for a great code scanner.  5 star app..

author: Drews Tavers
comment: This app is way too slow, it takes a good minute in between loading times. Had to revert to a previous version.
title: Can't use the app...

author: Thomas Rabe
comment: By far the most versatile QR scanner AND generator. UI is simple, bland, and effective. Plenty of options for privacy and link handling.

author: PRASHANTH K.K.
comment: its a good app, but regarding the timelimit for saved urls in their sever is only upto a month. It would be nice if it's a permanent way to store these links into a sever I would give it a five.

author: Zak B
comment: I installed several QR code apps, but not one could both read and generate codes, you want to share a web page you are browsing with someone, write down the URL on this app and it would generate a QR code that you would share in  easier way than a looong URL, this app does a great job, shortens urls...etc           .  I would advice you to use the QR code addon on you i ternet browser too i.e google chrome...etc
title: Read & generate codes

author: mat Farabee
comment: Love this app. No longer need to have wifi info written down. Put a qr code for our house wifi on the wall by the pc.

author: dave Yates
comment: like the clock widget lol what's the deal with the date format lol 2 last ones in the list am same think 1 should of been dd-mm-year , and wud like to see eg Monday 20th February 2017 thanks

author: andrew stienburg
comment: UI is somewhere date looking not it's the best it there from what I can tell

author: MEGAKILLER 171
comment: I can't get it to work for a Mii. I keep trying to get a Mii off a QR on a DS! Uninstalling.

author: Michał Łyczko
comment: Overall it's a great app but it needs a serious UI overhaul to something more modern... It's the best QR scanner currently available for free without ads...

Are kids born with instructions already in their brain that tells them how to use the new fandangeled apps?? Because I find all these new words and terms that I have no freaking idea what they mean!!! And no app has an icon that says "instructions for people over 60!!!!" So NO I don't like your Damn app just yet!
title: Not wonder woman

author: JCTP TP
comment: No annoying ads, plenty of options for scanning on different sources.

author: Naftali M
comment: For the average user who rarely used s products barcode scan. Not that intuitive to use
title: OK

author: Graham CAMPBELL
comment: Tiny app and yet easily the best available. It's never failed me; easy to create QR and XQR codes, read and store them. Great...and FREE!

author: graham bognar
comment: A good app, although it generates an incorrect qr code if you try to enter a multiple contact vcard, it uses only the first contact name with all the numbers

author: Paolo Z.
comment: Stopped working, now it only redirects me to a "bail 40" page telling me "the campaign is over". Uninstalled.
Not bad at all, takes care of the basic principles of QR code reader software applications and much more.

author: john uhlman
comment: I refuse to use any other Barcode Scanner except for this one
title: I love it

author: Raman Mehta
comment: The app works itself well. a small bug: when a code is scanned with flashlight on and using the Zapper engine, the flashlight icon remains highlighted after scanning the code.
title: Flashlight icon

comment: U have to only download it u will need no other qr code scanner.
title: Best app

author: AM. G.
comment: It is still in development and like a triangle I will give it a try once twice  maybe a third will lucky me some charm!!! 🤗😇😉😃😂😁😄

author: Cathy Hildebrand
comment: The best & absolutely most AMAZING scanner I've found yet by far!! & I've downloaded A LOT of different scanners, which ALL were deleted after using QR droid!!

author: Mason C. Rose
comment: Great app.  I use it at the store to scan a product to look up online for prices and product info.  I also use it to create codes to websites i use often.  And the business card is absolutely the best feature.

author: Ervan Abu Nangim
comment: Work extremely well on my old device. Guess i dont have to change to a newer phone, yet.

author: Forkor Augustine
comment: This app is the best so far I have seen among other QR and barcode scanners. Love it, easy to use. Does what I expect. Thanks to the developers

author: Thomas Caristo
comment: S7 widget displays date incorrectly after nougat update

author: Sean Aguilar
comment: Still the best out there. Create codes, read from gallery. Fast and full featured. Thank you!

author: Erik Hammack
comment: Great app. Would be nice if it could recognize when it sees multiple codes at the same time and ask you to either pick one or decode all.

author: Juan Carlos Adolfo López García
comment: Recomiendo esta aplicación ya que es muy util para poder simplificar las búsquedas de contactos o productos en Internet
